entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 01:07 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 01:07 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h after midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 01:07 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
